statement.p: Marcel is running a race. He has completed 20 km, which happens to be 50 of the total race. How long is the race? Preview Question 1 Â km

solution.p: We recall that a percent (converted to decimal) is part/whole = percent. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{20}}{{w}}={0.5}. We can solve this for \displaystyle{w}.
